name: StickyMan (awpas50)
description:
Install instructionsIMPORTANT: The game is currently unplayable on web. Please download PC version instead.

2021/2/21

Somehow itch.io just bugged and I can't post any screenshots & cover image. Here's the brief:

StickyMan is a strategy defense game. You got a weapon to freeze anything in the map including enemies, walls and any other obstacles. You can stick enemies and they will help you to fight, or sticking a bunch of obstacles as a shield.  This weapon has a long cooldown so you must use it wisely, freeze as many enemies as possible before you are outnumbered.
